Class Edge<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • tr.edu.gtu.cse.gte.Edge<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the vertices linked by this edge

    public class Edge<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an edge in the graph structure.
